frontmatter.title: Managing Third Party Risks for Keepspeech project
frontmatter.summary:
Today we resolved an integration error caused by a recent change on Zoomâ€™s
side which temporarily disrupted the core product feature.

`,(0,r.jsx)(i.p,{children:`Since we rely on third party platforms like Zoom, we often have no visibility into

frontmatter.title: Keepspeech Microsoft Teams Integration
frontmatter.summary:
Completed Microsoft Teams integration; conducted user testing
refined UI and usability based on feedback.

frontmatter.title: Keepspeech logo design
frontmatter.summary:
Our Keep Speech logo design is more than just art,
it's your voice turned into text, effortlessly.

frontmatter.title: Keep Speech Meeting Productivity Tool
frontmatter.summary:
Unveiling 'Keep Speech': a meeting app reshaping digital communication.
It ensures no message is lost, blending user-friendly design with innovation
